title: Våre beste år
overview: A Raddis family moves to the west end in the mid-80s and gets the Yapp era in the middle of their face. Son Ole Martin is transformed into a petty materialist, while daughter Simone is taken by the political right-wing wave. At the same time, mum Siri is fighting a desperate battle to stop the Americanization of the youth program she works on at NRK.
